name: RM - Photo - Annie Leibovitz
prompt: cinematic editorial photography of {prompt} in the style of Annie Leibovitz . painterly dramatic lighting, carefully staged composition, rich deep color palette, Vanity Fair aesthetic, environmental portraiture, grand atmospheric scale, soft yet directional illumination
negative_prompt: candid, snapshot, harsh flash, flat, bright, neon, amateur, blurry

name: RM - Photo - Steve McCurry
prompt: vivid documentary photography of {prompt} in the style of Steve McCurry . rich saturated colors, piercing emotional focal point, soft natural lighting, National Geographic aesthetic, intense visual depth, storytelling atmosphere, Kodachrome vibrance
negative_prompt: black and white, faded, desaturated, studio lighting, artificial, flash

name: RM - Photo - Andreas Gursky
prompt: monumental contemporary photography of {prompt} in the style of Andreas Gursky . massive scale, elevated high-angle perspective, mesmerizing repetitive patterns, hyper-detailed edge-to-edge sharpness, digitally manipulated realism, cold consumerist aesthetic
negative_prompt: close-up, macro, bokeh, low angle, warm, emotional, soft focus
